title: Wafaqi Mohtasib inspection team to visit NADRA, Passport Office in AJK on July 11, 12
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 08 (APP): Responding to a large number of complaints against the federal government organizations in Azad Jammu and Kashmir on Monday, the Wafaqi Mohtasib, Ejaz Ahmad Qureshi under the suo-moto powers, vested in him under the relevant law, has decided to constitute an Inspection Team under the Director General, Muhammad Ashfaq Ahmad, which will undertake a two-day visit of the Azad Kashmir on July 11-12.
On July 11, 2024 the Inspection Team will visit the NADRA office, Passport Office and Benazir Income Support Programme (BISP) and would listen to the public complaints and issue on the spot instruction for their resolution.
Whereas on July 12, the two member Inspection Team comprising the DG (Admn) and Consultant(Media) would hold a Khuli Katcheri in the Wafaqi Mohtasib Regional Office located at Muzaffarabad.
It is expected that the Khuli Katcheri would be attended by a large number of people including the civil society and media and would help resolve public complaints.
